description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 6/12/2006

Ridge shows Brooke the lingerie for Brooke’s Bedroom line and tries to persuade her to be with him. Brooke once again tells Ridge her future is with Nick. Ridge asks Dante if he loves Felicia, or just wants to give Dino a family. Later, Bridget and Dante confess their love for one another. Stephen tells Jackie what happened with Taylor (that he slept with Taylor as well). Jackie decides the two should be friends, but before he leaves they kiss in a more than friendly way.
